job_title: Entry Level: Quality Analyst/ Business Analyst
full_description:
\n
Company Description
\n
NSIT Solutions is a premier technology savvy company providing onsite, offsite, offshore services to our clients. NS IT Solutions is the link between business and technology, offering a wide range of software services to clients. We provide objective business advice of uncommon clarity that helps clients achieve market-leading results by channeling knowledge and value, coupled with our commitment to quality software services.
Job Description
\n
This position is responsible for the following functions:
\n
\n
Create ETL Testing and Performance Test Scenarios
\n
Implement test data scenarios/scripts for integration and regression testing
\n
Build/customize test automation scripts
\n
Execute Test Scenarios and Document Issues & Defects
\n
Set up test scripts and test data
\n
Execute ETL Testing and transformation processes
\n
Identify the defect and trouble shoot issues
\n
Support application Test Development and Execution
\n
Work with business owner to identify application test cases
\n
Support Application test development and execution
\n
\n
\n
Minimum Requirements:
\n
\n
Experience participating in a significant QA effort preferably specific to data integration testing.
\n
Data warehouse concepts and querying including the ability to understand SQL and write moderately complex SQL queries.
\n
Ability to optimize data, taking complex sets of data and managing them via filters, calculations, and visually compelling graphical user interface.
\n
Ability to effectively troubleshoot reporting and data issues across the multi-tier environment such as user interface, semantic layer and database.
\n
Ability to work in a self-directed environment and clearly communicate tasks to team members and the ability to follow up and oversee other associates
\n
\n
\n
The primary duties of the Business Analyst will include:-
\n
\n
The main responsibility of the role is to review, interpret, analyse and clarify client requirements.
\n
Generate various types of Business and Technical document(s) to satisfy client requirements.
\n
Run test cases and report issues to the test manager.
\n
Gather findings and provide relevant supporting documentation.
\n
Work closely with internal stakeholders to build and maintain strong relationships.
\n
Test preparation, including design of test cases.
\n
Understand current and desired state business processes.
\n
Analytical thinking and project issue resolution.
\n
Build structured approaches for decision making.
\n
Provide innovative technology solutions to support the business.
\n
Qualifications
\n
\n
\n
College degree( Bachelor's/ Master's)
\n
Excellent writing/documentation, communication, analysis and organizational skills required
\n
Strong aptitude in both business and technology
\n
Self-starter with excellent organizational and time management skills
\n
\n
Additional Information
\n
\n
All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
\n
